TestCase.name: complicatedTranspose
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d.d1, d.d2 + b FROM SimpleTable
LogicalProject(d1=[$3.d1], EXPR$1=[+($3.d2, $1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

LogicalProject(d1=[$0.d1], EXPR$1=[+($0.d2, $1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, b, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

TestCase.name: simpleTranspose
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM SimpleTable
LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])
LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeExcludeRowTime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT SECOND(c) FROM SimpleTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[EXTRACT(FLAG(SECOND), $2)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[EXTRACT(FLAG(SECOND), $0)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(select=[c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithDuplicateColumns
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, b as e FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, e]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, e]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, d]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithExcludeComputedRowTime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, b]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, d]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithExcludeComputedRowTime2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, SECOND(d) FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(select=[a, b]), $3)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[a, b]), $2)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, d]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithExcludeComputedRowTime3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SECOND(d) FROM NestedTable

LogicalProject(select=[a]), $3)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[myFunc($3, $2.c2)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[a]), $1)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[myFunc($1, $2.c2)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, d, c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithIncludeComputedRowTime
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, d FROM VirtualTable

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, d]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($3, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[d], watermark=[-($2, 5000:INTERVAL SECOND)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, d]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c])]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithNestedField
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, d.d1, d.d2 FROM SimpleTable
LogicalProject(select=[b]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])
LogicalProject(select=[b]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, d, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithReorder
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b, a FROM SimpleTable
LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, SimpleTable]])

TestCase.name: transposeWithWatermarkWithMultipleInput
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM UdfTable
LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[b], watermark=[myFunc($1, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable]])

LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[b], watermark=[myFunc($1, $2)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable]])
